thread.section_title: Travelodge London Stratford - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great budget hotel
thread.title_full: Great budget hotel - Review of Travelodge London Stratford, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Sophia G
title: Great budget hotel
text:
Great value for money, we stayed three nights while standing festival at the O2. Could get from the hotel in to the O2 in less than half an hour.
Room was clean and basic but as expected for a travelodge. Bed was very comfortable but the TV was very small - not a big deal but could have been a little larger.
We didn't eat in the hotel but there is plenty of food places short walk near Westfield or in the Stratford shopping centre. I would stay again.
